description: Source code for a Flutter widget representing a filter screen for user inputs to set filtering criteria, including height, weight, race, and hair color, with save and reset functionality.

classes.name: FilterScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides a user interface to set filtering criteria such as height, weight, race, and hair color, with options to save or reset the filters.

classes.name: _FilterScreenState
classes.description: State class for FilterScreen handling UI state, user interactions, and invoking provider methods to update filters.

classes.name: Range
classes.description: A data class representing a range with minimum and maximum values, used for height and weight ranges.

classes.name: Race
classes.description: Enumeration representing different races, included via external import.

classes.name: HairColor
classes.description: Enumeration representing different hair colors, included via external import.

methods.name: _apply
methods.description: Parses input fields, creates a FilterCriteria object, updates the FilterProvider, and navigates back.

methods.name: _reset
methods.description: Resets input fields and filters to default values.
